txt.en: Read the notes on the altar
Within the Dead City of Minas Morgul, a locked chamber of the Witch-king has opened.
Enter further into Roz Dagalur, the Fiend-house
Enter further into Roz Dagalur, the Fiend-house
The chambers along the room's walls begin to shift
Read the notes on the altar.

You inspect the book. It seems to be a journal, written in Black Speech. Each page lists the names of the four gaunt-men you have bested, as well as various indecipherable notes. The first four pages also reference Ivar, Thadúr, Ferndúr, and Drugoth, four of the gaunt-lords. There is a fifth and final page of writing that lists the name, Gortheron. No notes have been taken on this page. You believe the Witch-king may have been attempting to create a new set of gaunt-lords to command and locked it away here. Luckily his work seems to have gone unfinished. It is good that you were able to defeat these gaunt-men before the notes were discovered by one of Sauron's former servants.
